entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 06:16 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa steady
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -17.5°C
Wind: NNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
